quotes.message: Smoking is one of the leading causes of all statistics.
quotes.name: Liza Minnelli

quotes.message: Much smoking kills live men and cures dead swine.
quotes.name: George D. Prentice

quotes.message: Every time you light up a cigarette, you are saying that your life isn't worth living.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: No one can quit smoking for you, or make you want to change your life. No one can make you do anything that you don't want to do.
quotes.name: Gudjon Bergmann

quotes.message: Today just might be the best day to start seriously thinking about quitting smoking.
quotes.name: Alexander Woollcott

quotes.message: To quit smoking, you must first want to quit, but then you must also do the quitting.
quotes.name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.message: Quitting smoking is rather a marathon than a sprint. It is not a one-time attempt, but a longer effort.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: Quitting cigarettes might be the hardest thing to do in life, but at least you will have one.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: You're always better off if you quit smoking; it's never too late.
quotes.name: Loni Anderson

quotes.message: Every time you try to quit smoking you are actually getting closer to staying smoke free.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: There's nothing quite like tobacco: it's the passion of decent folk, and whoever lives without tobacco doesn't deserve to live.
quotes.name: Moliere

quotes.message: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
quotes.name: Brooke Shields

quotes.message: A cigarette is the only consumer product which when used as directed kills its consumer.
quotes.name: Gro Brundtland

quotes.message: Smoking is hateful to the nose, harmful to the brain, and dangerous to the lungs.
quotes.name: King James I

quotes.message: Smoking is suicide by instalments.
quotes.name: H.M. Forester

quotes.message: Smoking is neither an art nor a sport. Better to liberate yourself before the body retaliates, for its vengeance would be a furious blow enthused out of all the bygone years' mercy you thanklessly thought you were entitled to.
quotes.name: Lukhman Pambra

quotes.message: The true face of smoking is disease, death and horror â€“ not the glamor and sophistication the pushers in the tobacco industry try to portray.
quotes.name: David Byrne

quotes.message: Rather than you smoking a cigarette, the cigarette is really smoking you.
quotes.name: Anthony Liccione

quotes.message: Smoking must be harder than not smoking. For the latter does not require any action.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: If you resolve to give up smoking, drinking, and loving, you don't actually live longer; it just seems longer.
quotes.name: Clement Freud

quotes.message: Cigarettes are a classy way to commit suicide.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: If quitting smoking seems hard right now, it is exactly what you should start doing.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: The best way to stop smoking is to just stop â€“ no ifs, and or butts.
quotes.name: Edith Zettler

quotes.message: Quitting smoking can be a very good test of ones character. Pass the test and you will have accomplished so much more than just get rid of one bad habit.
quotes.name: Abraham Maslow

quotes.message: It is easier to prevent bad habits than to break them.
quotes.name: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.message: Smoking kills half of all lifetime smokers.
quotes.name: Alex Bobak

quotes.message: If knowing about the dangers of smoking were enough, almost no one would smoke.
quotes.name: Gudjon Bergmann

quotes.message: Not only will giving up cigarettes put more money in your pocket, your body will thank you for it.
quotes.name: Auliq Ice

quotes.message: Cigarette smoking is clearly identified as the chief, preventable cause of death in our society.
quotes.name: C. Everett Koop

quotes.message: Tobacco exports should be expanded aggressively because Americans are smoking less.
quotes.name: Dan Quayle

quotes.message: The true face of smoking is disease, death and horror - not the glamour and sophistication the pushers in the tobacco industry try to portray.
quotes.name: David Byrne

quotes.message: Tobacco smoke contains chemicals that weaken the body's immune system, making it more susceptible to disease and handicapping its ability to destroy cancer cells.
quotes.name: Michael Greger

quotes.message: The tobacco companies knew quite early on the addictive nature of their product.
quotes.name: Neil Cavuto

quotes.message: Tobacco is the only industry that produces products to make huge profits.
quotes.name: Margaret Chan

quotes.message: The expansion of tobacco cessation centers is an important part of our historic and continuing effort to help smokers quit.
quotes.name: George Pataki

quotes.message: Giving up smoking is the easiest thing in the world. I know because I've done it thousands of times.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Smoking is definitely not cool anymore, and the folks who have worked against that have done a great job.
quotes.name: Tarana Burke

quotes.message: Save your life. Kill the smoke. Stamp the cigarette. Quick smoking forever.
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: All the suffering, stress and addiction comes from not realizing you already are what you are looking for.
quotes.name: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.message: I quit smoking in December. I’m really depressed about it. I love smoking, I love fire, I miss lighting cigarettes. I like the whole thing about it, to me it turns into the artist’s life, and now people like Bloomberg have made animals out of smokers, and they think that if they stop smoking everyone will live forever.
quotes.name: David Lynch

quotes.message: It's not the cigarette that kills you, it's the thoughts behind the cigarette that does.
quotes.name: Raghu Venkatesh

quotes.message: Watch your cigarette cravings in a curious, mindful way. Read: CURIOSITY KILLED THE CRAVING.
quotes.name: Raj Fernandes

quotes.message: Just smoke less and keep trying. If you smoke 10 cigarettes in a day, smoke only 9 for next 3 days then 8, then 7… and one day you will quit. Smoking cigarettes is not doing any good to you. It’s just killing you. You don’t wanna die yet.
quotes.name: Abhishek Kumar

quotes.message: I had not been at all fair to myself, or to anyone or anything near me, by keeping my cigarettes right there next to me or in my shirt pocket throughout the years.
quotes.name: Earl Chinnici

quotes.message: I'm more proud of quitting smoking than of anything else I've done in my life, including winning an Oscar.
quotes.name: Christine Lahti

quotes.message: After years of denial and deception, the Philip Morris company has admitted that cigarette smoking causes lung cancer and other diseases. This formal acknowledgment comes far too late but still we must all welcome it. It can be the beginning of clearing the air.
quotes.name: Bill Clinton

quotes.message: The believing we do something when we do nothing is the first illusion of tobacco.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: It takes a lot of dedication to quit smoking, and whether you give up for good on your first try or have to give it a couple of tries - just keep swinging at it and you will succeed.
quotes.name: Harmon Killebrew

quotes.message: I want all hellions to quit puffing that hell fume in God's clean air.
quotes.name: Carrie Nation

quotes.message: I quit smoking. I feel better. I smell better. And it's safer to drink from old beer cans lying around the house.
quotes.name: Roseanne Barr

quotes.message: I gave up smoking four years, two weeks, and five days ago.
quotes.name: Sandra Scoppettone

quotes.message: Smoking is very bad for you and should only be done because it looks so good. People who don't smoke have a terrible time finding something polite to do with their lips.
quotes.name: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.message: It's official: Nicorette is the best cure for nicotine addiction. Just put a patch over each eye and you won't be able to find your cigarettes.
quotes.name: Brendan O'Carroll

quotes.message: Sucking on a burning scrap of rotting leaf is not the best way to stay young.
quotes.name: Joseph O'Connor

quotes.message: I've stopped smoking... I think the cost was a lot of it, and not being able to breathe. I first gave up smoking when I was eight.
quotes.name: Dave Allen

quotes.message: People are so rude to smokers. You'd think they'd try to be nicer to people who are dying.
quotes.name: Roseanne Barr

quotes.message: Get me well so I can get on television and tell people to stop smoking.
quotes.name: Nat King Cole

quotes.message: I ran like a cheetah-well, like a cheetah that smoked too much.
quotes.name: John Green

quotes.message: While many people give up smoking, on their own or with medicinal products, many fail. ‘Quit or die’ is no longer the only option for those who cannot give up.
quotes.name: The Global State of Tobacco Harm Reduction

quotes.message: Tobacco kills eight million people each year. This includes one million deaths from second-hand exposure.
quotes.name: World Health Organization

quotes.message: The culture is about moving to a place where tobacco and smoking isn't part of normal life: people don't encounter it normally, they don't see it in their big supermarkets, they don't see people smoking in public places, they don't see tobacco vending machines.
quotes.name: Andrew Lansley

quotes.message: I've chosen to get the word out to women, especially young women, that tobacco is not glamorous - it's addictive and smoking takes a serious toll on your health.
quotes.name: Mena Suvari

quotes.message: Cigars, cigarettes, and hookah tobacco are all smoked tobacco — addictive and deadly. We need effective action to protect our kids from struggling with a lifelong addiction to nicotine.
quotes.name: Tom Frieden

quotes.message: Politicians and ideologically-driven advocates should not be explicitly working to scare tobacco users from using a product that, relative to smoking, does less harm to their health, and is proven to be an effective means in helping them quit smoking altogether.
quotes.name: NZ Vaping Alliance

quotes.message: I’ve had a couple of cigarettes here and there, and every time I put one in my mouth and bite it and smoke it, it tastes awful.
quotes.name: Ryan Storey

quotes.message: To me, it’s not that I’m a 100 percent nonsmoker, but I cut down the tobacco that I do use. To me, that’s a plus. If it eventually leads me to being a 100 percent nonsmoker forever, great. If all it does is cut me back, that’s fine, too.
quotes.name: Travis Barker

quotes.message: Either quit smoking or get a new lighter.
quotes.name: Federal Marshal Quigley

quotes.message: I was gonna focus on quitting smoking. But it turns out quitting smoking is stressful. And when I'm stressed-out, I smoke.
quotes.name: Earl
